summary: ICP-hosted web app with shareable link/QR code; add a new "Schedule today" section linking to a Google Form.

existing_features.title: Add a new “Schedule today” section to the app’s Daily Dashboard page (route “/”) that contains a visible, clickable link to the provided Google Form URL: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfxpu1-1IO77u1JSIYvige65225NJq5bRUSKVnHO7C3N_Nd2Q/viewform

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a "Schedule today" section in the app containing a link to the provided Google Form URL.

projectName: Add “Schedule today” section linking to Google Form
